title: When your girlfriend is an AI: Malayalam short film ‘Soosi’ rethinks romance and technology
description: The AI avatar was created in just one day using tools such as Midjourney, and the film was completed in three months..AI short film, Soosi film review, Malayalam AI movie, AI and relationships, Artificial intelligence in cinema, Emotional connection with AI, LLM filmmaking, AI avatar movie, Spike Jonze Her comparison, Human-AI interaction, AI influence on emotions, Jerry Titler Soosi, Creating AI characters, AI movie Kochi, Emotional comfort AI

title: Tamil Nadu to Host India's First Sovereign AI Park in Partnership with Sarvam AI
description: The Government of Tamil Nadu has signed a landmark Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Sarvam AI to establish India's first full-stack Sovereign Artificial Intelligence Park, marking a major step in the country's AI and digital sovereignty ambitions.

title: A$AP Rocky Says 'Helicopter' Video Was Not Made Using AI
description: A$AP Rocky is pushing back against speculation that his latest music video relies on artificial intelligence.
content:
A$AP Rocky has denied that his upcoming “Helicopter$” music video was created using artificial intelligence.

title: AI helps fuel new era of medical self-testing
